Package com.example.application.services

Class InteractionService

java.lang.Object
com.example.application.services.InteractionService
@Service public class InteractionService extends Object
Service to manage all post interactions.

    • isReposted

      public boolean isReposted(Post post, User user)
      Given a post and a user, this method checks whether: - User has already reposted any post refering to the same original post as the post given as parameter - User has already reposted any repost of the original post, which is the one given as parameter
      Parameters:
      post -
      user -
      Returns:
      true or false depending on the conditions explained before

    • pointedRepost

      public void pointedRepost(Post post, User user) throws PostException
      Tries to create a new pointed repost given a post to be reposted and the user trying to repost. If successful, the new repost is then saved on the database and the point distribution is performed.
      Parameters:
      post - post that is going to be reposted
      user - user that is trying to repost
      Throws:
      PostException - if there are no enough points to create the repost

    • notPointedRepost

      public void notPointedRepost(Post post, User user)
      Creates a not pointed repost
      Parameters:
      post - Post being reposted
      user - User reposting

    • pointDistribution

      public void pointDistribution(Post post, User user)
      Makes the point distribution following these rules: - The original post always receives 15 points. It doesn't matter if the original post is the one being reposted directly or not. - If the post parameter is not the original post, it receives 10 points. - If the post parameter is not the original post, all the posts between it and the original post (branch) receive 5 points. - In all previous cases, if a post receives points, the owner of that post receives the same amount of points.
      Parameters:
      post - Post that was directly reposted.
      user - User that reposted

    • deleteRepost

      public void deleteRepost(User reposter, Post post)
      Given a User and a Post that has been reposted by the same user, delete the post's repost from user's profile.
      Parameters:
      reposter - User that reposted the post in the past.
      post - Post that was reposted by the user in the past.

    • commentItems

      public List<com.vaadin.flow.component.messages.MessageListItem> commentItems(Post post)
      Takes a Post and returns a list of MessageListItem, which are the comments related to that post.
      Parameters:
      post -
      Returns:
      the list of MessageListItem that are related the post's comments

    • newComment

      public void newComment(Post post, User user, String text)
      This method takes a post, a user that comments in that post and a String containing the text. A new object Comment is created and then saved by a method of the CommentsRepository.
      Parameters:
      post - Post that received the new comment
      user - User that commented
      text - The comment itself
